abstract: Minneapolis Mayor Betsy Hodges requests federal civil rights investigation into officer-involved shooting of black man Jamar Clark, who remains hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Betsy Hodges of Minneapolis called for a federal civil rights investigation into an officer-involved shooting early Sunday.

headline.main: Minnesota: Federal Inquiry Sought Into Shooting
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Federal Inquiry Sought Into Shooting

snippet: Mayor Betsy Hodges of Minneapolis called for a federal civil rights investigation into an officer-involved shooting early Sunday.
